title: When do classes start for college? - Quora

response.answer_text: College classes start at varying times and dates all year round. The answer depends on the school you are attending and the schedule of classes you enroll in. Seems pretty simple to look up the class schedule for the school you are interested in. I mean no single person can read your mind and give you the answer to an incomplete question

Look up the college schedule online. Times are usually posted. Depending upon the size of the student body, many classes are offered at different times and/or on different days. it is often the case that old schedules, from the year before, are closely followed, although the instructors may be different. Some classes are only offered in even or odd years and some only in the evening, especially graduate courses (for working students wanting a master’s degree).

Hi!! As per the news comes all NITs, IIITs and IITs are going to start their classes after Diwali. But for other colleges I mean private these are going to start their classes after October onwards. But uptu is going to start their classes in mid of December because councelling itself is held till 6december Hope this answer is helpful to you Thank you!!
I have studied two college one is banaras Hindu University where classes usually starts at someday 9:45am,someday 8:45am … Second is University of Allahabad where now classes are starts at 10:45am
